title: Sales Learning and Development Officer
text:
Sales Learning and Development Officer

Deliver and evaluate effective learning solutions for Capita, ensuring that all material is up to date, fit for purpose and drives business performance. As an organisation, the personal development of our employees is at the heart of what we do so we are looking for a Telesales trainer who can not only deliver initial sales and product specific training, but also provide ongoing coaching and development as required.

As the successful candidate, you must be able to demonstrate a team spirit with a passion for training and development in a high-energy sales environment. You will then deliver the curricula needed to develop the sales force. The success is measured by the ramp time for sales consultants (new hires, new products, new campaigns, etc.), overall sales team productivity, and the satisfaction of sales consultants and leaders.
